name: Super Breakout 13
summary: Super Breakout is an exciting arcade game where you control a spaceship and bounce a ball to destroy all the alien obstacles and save the world. You must use your quick reflexes and strategic thinking to navigate through space tubes, break down walls, and clear all the obstacles in your path. With each level, the challenges become increasingly difficult, but you can collect power-ups along the way to help you. Can you master the game and save the world from the alien invasion? Play Super Breakout now to find out!
